Message Count: 2

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C1G932G_00
From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
To: Dee Deu <dee.deu@chalhoub.com>
CC: Kamran Abbasi <Kamran.Abbasi@chalhoub.com>; Joe Hobeika <Joe.Hobeika@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-03-04 12:54
Subject: Meetings with Nasco (Tomorrow, 11 AM) and Marsh (Friday, 4 PM) - Cyber Insurance Proposal
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Dee,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

I will be scheduling a Teams meeting with Nasco for tomorrow, March 5th, at 11:00 AM. This meeting will be an opportunity to briefly discuss any history of losses Nasco may have experienced due to cyber breaches. We will also review the proposal details and address any technical clarification questions we may have, as well as any questions from the brokers.

 

Similarly, I will be scheduling a Teams meeting with Marsh for Friday, March 8th, at 4:00 PM to cover the same topics. Please feel free to forward these meeting invitations to any team member who will be joining as well.

 

If these times are not suitable, please let me know what alternative times work, and I will coordinate accordingly.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 8045000
